lines.text: Maybe... he blocked the bullet with one of those wax candles, and then put the sticker on!
No, like... longways. It'd get stuck in the wax, right? Wax is sticky?
Not that sticky. Might throw the bullet a little off course, but it's not gonna stop anything.
Anyway, wouldn't stopping the bullet at all take away its <c=#FF00FF>momentum?</c>
If it got stopped normally, it wouldn't be able to rebound and kill Slick.
